sen.j: 良源は、最澄（伝教大師）の直系の弟子ではなく、身分も高くはなかったが、南都（奈良）の旧仏教寺院の高僧と法論を行って論破したり、村上天皇の皇后の安産祈願を行うなどして徐々に頭角を現わし、康保3年（966年）には天台宗最高の地位である天台座主に上り詰めた。
sen.e: Although Ryogen was not a direct disciple of Saicho (Dengyo Daishi) and his rank was not high, he gradually distinguished himself as an able priest through refuting high priests of traditional Buddhist temples in nanto (Nara City) or praying safe delivery of a child for the Empress of Emperor Murakami, and finally he climbed up to Tendaizasu, the supreme position in Tendai Sect, in 966.

sen.j: 延暦寺には承平 (日本)5年（935年）に大規模な火災があり、根本中堂をはじめとする多くの堂塔を失い、荒廃していた。
sen.e: When Ryogen became Tendaizasu, Enryaku-ji Temple was devastated as it had lost a lot of doto (temple halls and towers) due to a big fire broke out in 935.

When Ryogen became Tendai-zasu, Enryaku-ji Temple was devastated as it had lost many doto (temple halls and towers) including Konpon-chudo Hall, due to the big fire that broke out in 935.

sen.j: 良源が天台座主に就任した康保3年（966年）にも火災があったが、良源は村上天皇の外戚（皇后の実父）である藤原師輔の後援を得て、焼失した堂塔を再建した。
sen.e: A fire broke out also in 966, the year when Ryogen became Tendaizasu, but Ryogen reconstructed doto which was destroyed by fire with the support of FUJIWARA no Morosuke, the consort clan of Emperor Murakami (father of the Empress).
